item.description:
All you single gal's & guy's come one come all!


Join Lock and Key Events and Cupid.com/PreDating on Friday, March 20th at our next Boston, MA Lock and Key Event. It's the interactive and FUN way to socialize, make new friends, meet your match....or just to have a great time! We are THE Lock And Key Events you've heard about! Grab a cocktail and get ready to Unlock Your Possibilitiesâ„¢. Lock and Key Events transform a regular happy hour by adding the ULTIMATE ice breaker theme. It's like no other party you have ever attended!!! With your lock or key, you now have a reason to talk to anyone and everyone you want! What a great way to unwind after a long work week...or kick off a night on the town!


Go to website for tickets.

http://www.lockandkey...

Call (978) 204-5295 or email boston@lockandkeyevents.com for more info.



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW IT WORKS
Your goal is to match the right lock with the right key
Do it and get a ticket for the prize drawing, more tickets = more chances to win!
You then get a new lock or key and go back into the fray to repeat the process
Find someone you like, stay and talk for a bit! Exchange contact info if you like.
Throughout your quest you'll meet 50, 100 or more people of the opposite sex.
Have questions? Read our Frequently Asked Questions page.

READ TESTIMONIALS FROM PAST PARTIES
Click Here To See What They're Saying!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
District Restaurant & Lounge
180 Lincoln St.
Boston, MA 02111
Location Phone: (617) 426-0180

TIPS:
1. Leave as early as you can, check-in begins at 7:00 PM
2. If you are lost, call District Restaurant & Lounge at 617-426-0180 or us at (978) 204-5295.


DIRECTIONS:

IMPORTANT PARKING NOTE:
Metered street parking available at no charge after 7pm. District Lounge also has Valet Parking available for $20 per vehicle.



Try Mapquest.


WHERE INSIDE:
Our Event will be in a private area! Just look for our Check-in Table when you arrive! Special VIP entrance for prepaid guests!!



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PRIZES YOU CAN WIN ON MARCH 20TH!
Every time you unlock, you can win prizes such as:
One $75 CASH Prize!
One - Whitewater Rafting Trip for 1 (includes 1 night camping) from Whitewater Challengers ($87.50 value)
Two - "VIP Passes", (good for 3 FREE Personal Training Sessions) from Fitness Together ($240 value each)
1 - One Hour Massage from LB Muscular Therapy by Lori Bisbano, LMT ($80 value)
745 High St. Suite 250, Westwood, MA (617) 947-4497
One $50 Bar Tab at District Restaurant & Lounge
One - piece of Hand-Crafted Sterling Silver Jewelry from SterlingLady.com ($50+ value)
One - 8 x 10 Photo to Watercolor paper custom print from Creative Printing Concepts ($35 value)
Complimentary Admission tickets to Cupid.com/PreDating Speed Dating Events - which includes a 1-month online dating membership (Package Value $65-$75)
Complimentary Admissions into future Lock And Key Events
And more!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be out front @ 7:pm. See my pic.
item.name: LOCK & KEY EVENT
